primaryTopic.creator: http://editor.vocabs.ands.org.au/user/Natalia-Atkins
primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: The Department focuses on environmental regulation, approvals and appeals processes, and pollution prevention. The department was established on 1 July 2013, when the former Department of Environment and Conservation was split into the Department of Parks and Wildlife and the Department of Enviroment Regulation. (Courtesy of Wikipedia)
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: Department of Water and Environmental Regulation (DWER), Western Australian Government

prefLabel._value: Department of Environment Regulation (DER), Western Australian Government

primaryTopic.replaces: Department of Environment and Conservation (DEC) , Western Australian Government
primaryTopic.scopeNote: Organisation no longer exists. Replaced by Department of Water and Environmental Regulation (DWER), Western Australian Government. Replaces http://vocab.aodn.org.au/def/organisation/entity/65
